attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus :(
attributes.review: I downloaded this apps in hopes of being able to see what my bestie Donny was up to in the White House lately, but as soon as I opened the app my phone began coughing and wheezing. My phone now has a fever of 104.7 and is being hospitalized. I blame this app.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is so misleading and not showing what America is I was a trump supporter in 2016 but from his response to the black life’s matter movement and how he is treating the lgbtq+ community and how he handle COVID I have to say let’s go joe we elected a clown in 2016 and we got a circus we need trump and pence out now

attributes.title: The absolute worst app
attributes.review: This app yelled white power at me and said that China is ruining America. Just horrible would not recommend. I also ended up having orange stains everywhere somehow. I don’t know how that happened. But don’t do it don’t download. A waste of 4 years

attributes.title: Very offensive😪
attributes.review: First off I opened the app and say that all Mexicans will be sent back to there county and that’s not aceptable like that is just racist this is just a horrible app ever and mr orange thinks he can do what ever he wants well no so like take this app off is just telling everyone to be racist and nope.

attributes.title: app crashed my phone 🤮🤢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone crashed immediately...Then I noticed all my info was erased. Pretty sure it’s stealing information off our phones...Don’t bother getting this app, you will break out.

attributes.title: Periodt
attributes.review: First of all I got to see an ugly fat orange Cheetos on my screen which is disgusting and should have been removed from my screen immediately. I was so disgusted I didn’t want to come on The App Store ever again if this App doesn’t Get removed immediately!!!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: The app is terrible. The app says many many things that are unethical. It is also an app supporting a racist, a rapist, a anti-lgbtq+, a man who is against free health care, a man who doesn’t support our environment, and last but not least a man that used to be great friends with a man who rapped children.

attributes.title: disappointed to say the least
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to make sure i know when the upcoming rally’s are and anything else related to our president. i ignored the reviews saying that upon opening the app i’d be greeted with donald trumps nude body because i assumed it was a prank or joke but the reviews are true😔 as soon as i saw it i began uncontrollably sobbing. i’m traumatized. today i was diagnosed with ptsd 😕 all because of this app.  i can’t even see a bag of cheetos anymore without remembering what i saw💔

attributes.title: this makes me wanna die
attributes.review: i used to be a trump fan, but after downloading this horrific app, i am now a leftist. im sorry but his cheeto colored face is too ugly and disgusting. do NOT vote for this evil tyrant in november. people all around the world see him and think, “wow, this is the face of america? ghetto as HELL!” and i dont blame them. i am disgusted.
